1: Out of the depths I cry to you, Yahweh.\q
2:
Lord, hear my voice;\q let your ears be attentive
\q to my pleas for mercy.


\q
3:
If you, Yahweh, would mark iniquities,\q Lord, who could stand?
\q
4:
But there is forgiveness with you,\q that you may be revered.


\q
5:
I wait for Yahweh, my soul waits,\q and in his word I hope.
\q
6:
My soul waits for the Lord\q more than watchmen wait for the morning.


\q
7:
Israel, hope in Yahweh.\q Yahweh is merciful,
\q and he is very willing to forgive.
\q
8: It is he who will redeem Israel\q from all his sins.
